1.question: What is the primary goal of the one-dimensionally oriented self-assembly approach discussed in the article?

C. To synthesize 2D films with variable thickness
D. To develop 1D nanostructures without porosity
E. To produce 3D structures with controlled dimensions

options: A. It acts as a solvent.
B. It is used as a colorant.
C. It serves as a curing agent.
D. It functions as a reducing agent.
E. It acts as a stabilizing agent.

options: C. Formation of a solid-electrolyte interface (SEI) layer
